messages.message: Is there a way to reset a user password with the admin privledges:
yeah you can do it in my sandbox (it’s down right now because of the db changes I made yesterday, but I’ll bring it back up shortly): https://heymian.sandbox.instabase.com/
you have your own special sandbox!?
Well when it goes to production you should be able to close my ticket out: https://instabase.atlassian.net/projects/IBTRIAGE/issues/IBTRIAGE-6?filter=allopenissues&orderby=priority%20DESC
it is in “prod”, it’s just off on a config flag which I don’t know if we want enabled on instabase.com (http://instabase.com). our customers use it.

Thats why we need an admin panel…… something i’ve been advocating for some time…. We have no “true admin”
There should be a reset password and send user an email function.
An admin panel like any other modern enterpise software has.
yeah my sandbox has the admin panel
Keeping all the good stuff to yourself
indeed :stuck_out_tongue: more buttons coming soon to this page as well - resetting MFA info and deactivating users. API only for now, but eventually buttons. fyi @Thomas Qin
